author: Tyler Pager, Jordan Fabian, Tyler Pager, Jordan Fabian
title: Coronavirus: Trump stokes partisan divide as approval ratings slump
description: Almost two-thirds of Americans say the president was too slow to take major steps to stop the virus, a Pew Research Centre study suggests
content:
President Donald Trump is fighting back against the public health and economic fallout from the coronavirus pandemic in the same way hes navigated other political perils by stoking the nations partisan divide.
But the scale of the crisis the US is facing mor… [+8661 chars]
